item.title: Curve Builder
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

I wrote this in C#.net, as I didnâ€™t feel like spending an hour plotting out these stupid lines and colouring them in for our art project.
If anyone wants the source, PM me. .NET 3.5 Executable is attached.

    public struct Curve
    {
        public Point VerticalPoint;
        public Point HorizontalPoint;
        public Pen Color;
        public Curve(Point Vertical, Point Horizontal, Pen Color)
        {
            this.VerticalPoint = Vertical;
            this.HorizontalPoint = Horizontal;
            this.Color = Color;
        }
    }
